text: A. B. M. Mohiuddin Chowdhury (1 December 1944 â€“ 15 December 2017) was a Bangladeshi politician. He was a member of the Bangladesh Awami League (BAL). He served as the mayor of Chittagong, the second-largest city in Bangladesh, from 1994 to 2009. He was born in Chittagong District. Chowdhury died on 15 December 2017 in Chittagong, at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Chittagong Division Category:Mayors
title: A. B. M. Mohiuddin Chowdhury
